messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unidentified lifesigns detected coming aboard Writer's Complex Quebec. Secure any exterior access, including ducting and ventilation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Paperwork Mishap Alert

A recent bureaucratic error in the Organic Resources Department may result in personnel shortages in some departments and redundant staffing in others.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: If you see Deathsquad, PLEASE DO NOT FEAR, We will not shoot as long as you stay at safe distance. There is a xeno infestation on the station

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unidentified lifesigns detected coming aboard Writer's Complex Quebec. Secure any exterior access, including ducting and ventilation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.
